1.content:
The sun is shining brightly as the helicopter brings you and the other four contestants down to the landing platform. You each received a call from one Mr. Vincent Rush, a man who is famous for doing these reality tv type challanges to give away his vast fortune, but he didn't say what the object of this game was.

You each unload from the helicopter, the five of you lining up as Mr. Rush approaches you.

"The Contestants are as follows" bellows a voice from the beyond

"Julia Kenoff. Age 20, Height: 5 Foot 4, Current Weight: 98 Pounds.
Blond hair, blue eyes, average build for her weight. Chosen for her: Determination to win any challenge set to her"

"Adam Setter. Age 18, Height: 5 foot 10, Current Weight 155 Pounds.
Brown Hair, Hazel Eyes, Weight Lifter's Build. Chosen for His: looks

"Caitlin Hall. Age 19, Height: 4 foot 11, Current weight, 110 Pounds.
Red Hair, Green Eyes, Slightly Chubby Build. Chosen for her: Charisma

"Ian Jones. Age 21, Height: 6 foot 1, Current weight: 210 Pounds
Blond hair, Brown eyes, Weight Lifter's Build, Chosen for his: strength

"Lauren Cartwright. Age 20, Height: Five foot 7, Current weight: 109 Pounds
Strawberry Blonde hair, Hazel Eyes, Slender but strong build, Chosen for her: Speed"

Mr. Rush steps forward.

"Welcome contestants to Isla de la Obeso. The literal translation of this name is "Island of the Obese One" which, my friends, is why you are here."

This cause you to look at your other contestants, who share your look of bewilderment.

"Thanks to a good friend of mine, this island now lives up to its name. He has provided many, many items for our little game. They have dispersed on the island. Each of these items will either make you gain or lose weight. That is the object of the game friends. You will be changing your weight regardless of what happens, but the one who at the end of this week who is the lightest of the five of you will win the million dollars. The rest of you will become permanent residents of the island, cursed to fluctuate in weight until the day you die. It was all in the contracts, albiet worded slightly different."

"You think!" you shout "this is unfair. We all worked hard to be who we are, and you are going to change our lives forever, just for your entertainment."

He walks slowly over to you smiling. He places a small wrapped candy in your pocket, and laughs. "Why, yes. Do enjoy that candy whenever you get around to eating it, my dear friend. Anyway, as I was saying. You will all find cabins to sleep in around the island, and there are no creatures on this island who wish to harm you, so from this moment on, it is just you five, and the magical powers of the Island of the Obese. Good Luck, and may the thinnest person win!"

"Great, just great" you say as you look down at your current body, knowing that it soon would be different, somehow.

Speaking of which, just who exactly are you?
1.title: Welcome to the Island

"Whatever" you say "I can still win this thing. I always do." you say, hoping the others hear you.

You strut over to the entrance of the woods that ecompass the island. The palm trees sway in the wind as you pass them.

You have every confidence that you will not gain a single pound of weight, in the entire week, not realizing that this is almost impossible as the ratio of cursed objects to non cursed ones is very one sided.

You walk deeper into the trees, and you can no longer hear the sound of your fellow contestants trudging through the trees behind you.

With your next step, you hear something that alarms you slightly, so you spin around to see what it was.

Your body starts becoming fatter. Your ass starts to fill up making the diaper fit more comfortably. Your breasts start growing a few cup sizes and your belly starts to get plumper. Your thighs start to rub against each other and you grow a second chin.

You take the large berry and pop it in your mouth. You chew it up quickly, the jucies flowing down your throat, and it tastes like heaven. You feel it hit the pit of your stomach and thats when the problems begin.

Your stomach starts gurgling really loudly, like it were hungry, but you aren't.

"What the?" you say, not thinking about the berry you just ate, and the fact that most everything on this island is enchanted and able to make you grow...

"Fatter? my fingers look fatter!" you shriek as you look down, and indeed they do, as a thin layer of fat has covered your entire body, and more is coming. Your body starts to vibrate as the fat moves on quicker and quicker.

"Oh, god! The Berry! I shouldn't have eaten that berry!" you say as your clothing gets tighter and tighter.

When all is said and done, you have gained a little over a hundred pounds from the berry.

"Great. Now I am chubby. Fantastic. Well, at least that was a small mistake.

With that, you move forward, continuing on through the woods. You walk for about an hour, when you stumble across something very strange. You take a moment to catch your breath as the new weight is slighly wearing you out.

You see...

11212.content:
You walk over to the green glow, and see that is pouring up from cracks in the ground. You hear strange tribal music coming from below as well.

"What the hell is going on down there." you say as you unintentionally shift your weight, which you were still getting used to, and you fall forward, onto the crack in the ground, which gives way.

"Oh My," you mumble as you fall through the earth into what seems like a huge cavernous hall under the ground. As you get up from the fall, you look and see that you are surrounded by men, all very thin men, who are smiling at you. From behind you feel a man pat you on the butt.

"Hey, what the fuck"

"Heren, hebben wij haar gevonden! Ik bereid nu de plak voor haar aanwinst voor!" he shrieks to the other men, who cheer in response."

He then grabs you by your wrist, and throws you onto a stone slab.

"Just who do you think you,,,OW!" you say as he straps your wrists down, and does the same to your ankles. You are trapped, and you are starting to freak out.

"What do you want from me."

"Nu, breng de Moeder Elixer! Breng vooruit het."

One of the men from the crowd brings a golden chalice forth, filled with a glowing green elixer..."The Glow!" you gasp, The leader takes it from him and smiles.

"You...be...beautiful...soon!" he musters as you look in horror as he takes the chalice, holds your nose, and pours it into your open mouth. You feel the thick warm liquid ooze down your throat. When he lets go, its too late, the drink is now in your stomach, and you feel it gurgle.

"Oh no." you whisper as you feel a tingle build up in your body. Suddenly you feel weight start to add itself, much faster than the berry had done it. You are blubbering up fast, and soon your clothes start to rip already having gained another hundred pounds...

"OH GOD!" you shriek as you start to gain faster and faster. Your shirt and pants tear off as the fat underneath explodes outwards. Your shoes are now incredibly tight, and the straps on your ankles and wrists are cutting into your flabby flesh.

Does it seem like it's stopping or are you still in full gaining swing.

They want and new queen, and you "dropped in" just in time, my dear. Have a good life, I'm sure it will be lavish, and most certainly...huge."

1121222.title: Tripled your Weight

11212221.content:
You quickly identified the glowing green liquid that filled the chalice as more weight gain elixer. Your eyes light up with horror as you realize with disbelief that you are still not fat enough for this skinny tribe of men. You muster all of your energy and with a loud grunt, attempt to roll off of the concrete slab. Unfortunately, your newly added flab keeps you pinned firmly in place, the wasted effort sending ripples through your massive body.

"you get beautiful, you be queeen. Lady Gargauntua!" Says the priest, making another attempt at english, as he closes the distance between the chalice and your mouth.

You close your mouth tightly as he approaches, but he pinches your nose closed, and with your arms uselessly swathed in blubber, you can do nothing to stop him. You open your mouth to take a deep gulp of air, and just as you finish drawing breath the priest tips the chalice, dumping the green liquid down your throat.

As the thick liquid reaches your gut, the gain quickly starts up again, packing hundreds of extra pounds onto your already immobile frame. Your butt blimps up, and the already thick rolls of fat down your sides swell even larger and ooze over the slab. Your huge gut stretching down your legs and spreading over the slab.

Horrified, you scream, "Nooooooo! Let me go, I don't want to be your Queen!"

'Queen' seemed to be the only word the men registered, for when they heard it they all began cheering and gossiping to each other in an unknown language. The priest smiled and said, "Yes, you Queen Gargauntua!" before darting out of the hall.

"No, I'm not!" You shriek, but nobody pays any attention... to your words at least. Every last one of the men gather around the concrete slab that you're on to admire your body, which you now notice is still growing! The many rolls and lovehandles at your sides have grown past the boundary of the slab, and are now hanging off the sides, slowly creeping towards the cold stone floor. Your ass and belly are taking a fair share of weight as well, as your hips are thrust higher into the air, and your belly slides closer to your feet.

The gain stops suddenly leaving you at an estimated weight of about 2,200 pounds, maybe more. As you look over your expanse of blubber with tears in your eyes, you hear a voice call out,

"Queen get more beautiful!"

You quickly recognize the voice to belong to the priest, and as you look up at the crowd surrounding you, it begins to part. All of the men clear a path directly in front of you, and as they do you see the priest coming through the crowd. It isn't until he gets closer that you see he's carrying...

"Excuse me, Miss! Who do you think you are, queen of the world. Stepping on people like that, why it's...it's..infuriating" the little man says with fire in his eyes, as he gets back up and dusts himself off.

"I...didn't see you there, I'm so sorry." you stutter.

"Keep that up, and I might have to keep this up all night, Little Missy" he states as your belly flops out of your shirt, becoming a paunch. Your butt was taking the biggest hit, becoming what anyone would call a very fat ass.

"Yes it is!" he replies. "I found her passed out on the side of the path leading to museum. It's a good thing I had a cart with me.

"Ahh, ha ha! She's turned out quite nicely! Lamita, did you work yourself too hard? It's a good thing we have Richard and his carts around here. Don't want people actually exercising and losing weight now, eh?! Hahahaa!"

Finally it dawns on you and you remember: The name on the girl's dress was Lamita! They're confusing you with her!

"Ohhhh, but I'm not Lamita!!" You exclaim. unable to stay silent any longer.

"Oh?" retorts the Elder.

"No, no...you have it all wrong. My name is Caitlin. I'm 19 years old, I'm not really a little girl. I just found Lamita's dress and it cut me and I became this...this body!"

"Ohhhhh....." says the Elder curiously, stroking non-existent facial hair. "Is that so?"

"Yes. I'm only on this island for a contest to win a million dollars. I didn't even want to do it after I got here and that man told me the rules."

"Huh." replies the Elder, blunty. She adjusts herself so she can move her head in a little closer. "Tell me, 'Caitlin'. What was the name written on the dress when you discovered it in the hut back in the mainland?" What? How did she know all that happened?

"Huh...? How do you-"

"What was the name written on it, 'Caitlin'?"

"Oh..." you say, blushing a little. "It was Lamita."

"You sure?"

Quite sure of it, you nod.

"Look again."

You suddenly notice Richard is standing right beside you holding the dress you took off earlier. You take it from him and examine where you saw the name and age written down, but it's gone. Confused, you try looking around the rest of the skirt but can't find anything written down anywhere. Out of the corner of your eye you can see the Elder's smug grin.

"I don't understand...it was written on here! I know it was!"

"No dear I'm afraid nothing was ever [i]really[/i] written on there."

"But-"

"It was the gods, who know your real name, that put it on there for you to discover."

"The gods...?"

"Oh, yes. Most of the people in this village wore that dress and found their real name on it once upon a time."

You stare at her and try to say something in response, but are unable to produce a fitting response.

"The gods of this island protect this village and it's inhabitants. They look down on us in our favor and bless us with food and happiness. The bigger we are, the more happy we live our lives, the more content they are with us. Every so often though, they bring us someone new from the rest of the island to join our family and make it even bigger. Gaining weight and becoming a little girl again are not coincidental. You've been chosen my dear Lamita to join us and start a new life, the gods favor you."

Floored by these revelations, you again try to produce a fitting response but are at a loss for words. Eventually you manage to muster out, "I....I don't know what to say."

"I know what you're thinking", says the Elder. "And let me just say, you should really choose the stay here! Ha ha! It's a good life. You get to eat all day, you don't have to work, and the gods don't really ask much of you. Yeah, you gotta give up your old life and everyone you used to know is gonna think you're DEAD...and really for all intents and purposes you are...but think about it. You're lucky the gods made you so young. You get a brand new chance at life with the wisdom you already have to live it any way you want. A lot of people would LOVE to have that chance."

Richard pokes in and interrupts. "I should add...", he says, clearing his throat. "You don't have to stay here if you don't want to. The gods will send you back to your home, wherever that may be, should you so desire. You won't actually remember any of this I'm afraid, but you will be back in your old life."

"So Lamita...whadda' ya say? A chance for a new life, or back to your dumb old boring one?"

In deep thought, you think to yourself. A new lease on life...sounds appealing. You've had your fair share of mistake and things you regret. But what about all the people you know? You'll be dead to your family and all your friends, never to see or hear from them again for as long as you still breathe. But, perhaps those people aren't worth caring for. Maybe your don't have your parents anymore? Perhaps you're on bad terms and want nothing to do with them. Take a moment to reflect on your own life situation, dear reader. What choice would you make?

1351121221.content:
"I...I want to stay here." You announce, confidently. It's taken some time to get to this point, but you are certain in your reasoning.

"Excellent! Wonderful! Fabulous!!" cries the Elder."Richard! Fetch the cake!"

Richard wanders off to a side room, presumably to obtain this 'cake'.

"Now now, you don't have to tell me your reasons why," says the Elder. "Everybody's got a different story. But more importantly, that life is behind you. Today, your new life begins!"

Richard reappears holding a plate with a slice of cake on it. It's a pretty standard fare cake with red frosting and sprinkles though it looks absolutely delicious.

"Ohhh...what's the cake for?" You ask, delighted to see food is involved in this process.

"Once you finish the cake, you pact with the gods and this village will be complete." says Richard, handing you the plate and a fork.

"Go on now, eat up." encourages the Elder. Excited to get something sugary, you dig in. The cake tastes sweet like nothing you've ever had before. Incredibly moist and rich, you quickly make work of the slice and set the plate down on a nearby table. "Mmmm...." you say, enjoying the last piece and you swallow it. Before you can go any further though, you feel a slight tingling on your body, not unlike the way you felt when you first changed. "Uh oh...?" you think to yourself. Your body grows a little bit bigger in size this time. You feel your tummy getting a bigger...your clothes are really stretched to their limit now...too much! RIIIIP! The fabric gives way under the size of your expanding girth, revealing an even bigger version of yourself to the elder.

"Oh gosh," you say, blushing beet red. "I'm so sorry! I didn't mean to rip it!" You try and cover yourself with the ripped fabric, but the Elder doesn't seem to mind at all.

"Ha ha!! That's just a little bit of divine comedy for you right there, Lamita!! Gain 30 pounds in a jiffy. Hilarious! Every time! Gwa ha ha ha!"

"Oh...", you say flabbergasted. "That was supposed to happen?"

"Uh-huh. The gods love it. Don't worry about bein' naked around here, we're all used to it. You're one of us now."

Her assurances make you feel a little bit better, tearing the clothing off. You notice now that Richard is suspiciously absent from the room. "Uhm...where did Richard go?" You implore the Elder.

"Oh, Richard? He's really just the village's spirit guardian. He comes and goes from time to time. Now c'mon, let's get you in some clothing...."

In the coming days you manage to integrate yourself into the community with the other children. Making friends and even going so far as to consider some of the older people your new parents. While initially self-conscious about your weight when you first became your size, the compliments from everyone on how beautiful they think you are quickly changes your perception and you grow to become proud of just how big you've become. The million dollars which initially drew you to the island quickly becomes irrelevant and you soon forget your previous life so completely that you can't even remember what your old name used to be. Over the years you make more friends in the village and become even bigger, but most importantly you live out your days happy and at peace with yourself.

You pick up the belt and inspect it. The leather itself looks like ordinary brown leather and has quite a few notches punched into it. It looks well worn, with signs of wear and tear occurring from roughly the last third of the belt's holes.

"Must have been a bit of a fatty." You say to yourself.

The fastening mechanism is just a stud that pops into each hole, and even though on testing it seems pretty sturdy, you still think it can slide loose if you engage in a bit of rough and tumble. A small tag has "Warning: may shrink when wet" printed on it. All in all, it's a pretty fine belt.

You take off you own belt and slip it the new one through the belt loops on your shorts. You manage to fasten it to the second hole, like you usually do. It seems a little tight though.

"Must be a small belt," you mumble while gauging how much room is left between your waistband and you. When you look at the gold plate, you see the number 210 has been engraved on it, the same number as your weight.

"Missed that earlier. Must be a sign- this is my lucky number and I intend on keeping it."

You chuckle to yourself as you undo the belt and set it at the next notch. A strange sensation passes over you and you see a small light shimmer across the buckle. The plate now reads 215.

"What the?"

While looking at the belt, you can see your stomach slowly rise up and out to fill the gap. It's only a small increase, kind of like taking a deep breath in, but when you poke it, you realise that your once rock hard abs are covered with a layer of fat.

"The fuck? This comes off now!" You undo the belt again and start to take it off when you accidentally push the stud through a notch two holes further down. The plate shimmers again and now reads 235.

"Oh hell no!" You cry out in frustration as you see your gut balloon out again. Your previous size 32" waist has blown up to a 35. You prod and poke your new gut and it jiggles.

"The fuck, I've never jiggled before in my whole life!"

An idea pops into your head. Maybe if you can bring it back to the notch it was in before, you'll lose the weight. You undo the tight belt, careful not to let it hit any other hole. You suck in your gut as much as you can and begin to pull it together.

After about five minutes of struggling you manage to hook it back into where you first started. The plate glows softly and a new number is etched onto it by the light- 210.

"Fuck yeah, I knew it would go..."

Your victory is cut short by another tingle that runs through your body. Instead of shrinking down like you thought you would, you instead feel incredibly bloated. A faint hissing sound can be heard and your whole torso begins to inflate outward. It stops fairly quickly, but the damage is noticeable. Now it looks like a rather fluffy pillow has been shoved down your shirt. Your underwear feels tighter, and with a few pokes you come to the conclusion that your ass has blown up too. Deciding to put off food for the time being, you stifle a burp and look at some of the other titles. One in particular jumps out at you.

"The adventures of Ian?" You take the book off the shelf and see an illustration of yourself on the cover. "The hell?"

You open it and look at the title page. The picture under the title is again one of you, but this time it shows you in your more bloated state. It even has a little speech bubble containing a *burp*. You then burp, as if in response.

You look at the first chapter and it reads exactly like everything that's happened so far. You see that the book is set up like one of those 'choose your own adventure' novels, with options at the bottom of each section and directions to other pages. Never being the type of guy that read these you flip to a random page somewhere in the middle. You see a picture of yourself, only that it looks like your stomach has swollen to the size of a beach ball. It looks like you're struggling against some vines or something. You're grasping onto one with both your hands as it looks like it's forcing its way into your mouth. Another seems to have manged to worm its way into your pants via your exposed butt crack. On further inspection you see that the picture of you also has... pitched a rather strong tent.

"What the *f-uuuurrrrp* is this?" You look at text and you spy the word loveweed. You pick up the Omnibus again and find its entry.

"A curious specimen that derives its name from the behaviour it displays during its reproductive cycle. The plant lures an animal to its main bed with enticing smells. Curiously, it chooses to mimic the smell of roasting meat, thereby attracting omniverous and carniverous animals, rather than the typical herbiverous and pollen feeding species one would expect. Once the animal is in close proximity to the main body of the plant, the loveweed releases a pheromone to subdue its target. Human subjects often report an extreme sense of arousal upon exposure, with some more sensitive to it reporting multiple orgasms during the whole experience."

Well now you know where the love in loveweed comes from.

"The weed then penetrates the animal through which ever orifices are available, generally preferring the anus and mouth. After each vine-like appendage meet inside the animal, the plant then pumps a creamy liquid through each of its two vines, the amount of which varies due to the difference in time between each captive. After the plant has finished, it severs the two appendages involved, which proceed to enter the animal. These two pieces are not alive in themselves, but merely contract up to meet each other and sit in the liquid it deposited earlier. The roots quickly dissolve in this medium, and provide nourishment for the various developing seeds found within."

"It knocks you *phhhhht* up?" You say to yourself as you fart again.

"The seeds do not germinate in the host however, and eventually work their way through its digestive system. This provides an excellent mechanism for seed dispersal. Of particular note is that a plant may impregnate an animal more than once, and that multiple plants may involve themselves with one animal."

"Now that's a ticket onto Jerry Springer if i ever heard one." You say to yourself.

"Seeing as how the loveweed has a fairly non-descript appearance, it is easily confused with several other plants in its Family. Classification is further hindered by the fact that loveweed tends to grow in areas that said family members have colonised themselves. Also, each plant behaves in the same way in attracting and sometimes forcefully capturing an animal, though none use this as a means of germination. The other related plants include:

Airweed: more placid than the loveweed, it waits until an animal stimulates its vines, then proceeds to pump air. People commonly use the plant as an aid in diving, but quickly find that its continual pumping makes it difficult to stay under water.

Gasweed: as aggressive as the loveweed, it deposits many small, soft pods in the animal and only stops when it senses that the animal has reached its limit. As the pods ripen, their liquid begins to bubble and upon bursting, instantly vapourise. This causes most victims to experience various amounts of bloating and severe gas attacks. As the pods are at different ages when deposited, the effect tends to continue for quite some time and at sporadic phases. As the gasweed is capable of depositing hundreds of these pods, victims can become quite inflated.

Waterweed: placid like the airweed, it pumps a water-like substance into the animal. In the event that another liquid source is nearby, it may transport that via its root system to the captive.

Vanillaweed: with a temperament like the waterweed and airweed, it pumps a calorie rich, thick, vanilla-like substance to the victim. Unlike other weeds, it only enters via the mouth. The vanilla milk was often used by locals to help the under nourished, as the body is capable of quickly absorbing the nutrients and converting it to fat.

Foamweed: more slender than the otherweeds, this variety does not pump anything into its victims, but rather, severs it appendages once it has invaded or after a given time period once it has been stimulated. The thin weed then decomposes after while and produces a foam-like substance. In animals, this foam migrates out of the stomach through to the rest of the body, giving an impression of all over body growth or inflation. The foam will only decompose into gas with certain agents (see entry Foamweed). This property, along with the fact that appendages will decompose outside of a host make it an excellent material for padding protection or even floatation devices.

Spongeweed: another weed that does not deposit anything into its victims besides parts of itself. A thin yet incredibly dense (it cannot be chewed or cut through and once it invades, it will continue to do so until the vine finishes), on its own, spongeweed does nothing. It is in fact quite beneficial to most healthy animals, quite often fighting off the effects of other toxins and agents. That it is the most aggressive member of the family may appear odd to some, until it's behaviour with other species is noted. Spongeweed absorbs any liquids from other weeds (and is capable of recognising liquids passed from waterweed) and quickly swells in size. The capacity to which it does so has yet to be recorded and some say there is no limit. It then manufactures a light gas, whose high activity makes it far more volumous than any other gas produced by the island inhabitants. The buoyancy of this gas even affects the host on land, with the subject appearing to bounce quite a bit when moving. This lack of coordination can prove haphazard, as other weeds are sure to be present nearby. This is particularly troublesome with the gasweed, as spongeweed invades the pods and produces twice as much gas as would normally occur. The process continues sporadically, although spongeweed's production of the gas tends to relate to how disturbed it is while in the gut. Victims report an increased sensitisation of skin, a pleasant sensation that results in further agitation and thus inflation.

A curious feature of these plants is that none of them seem to be in direct competition with one another, and as with the loveweed, are all more that willing to use the same victim more that once and also after different species. It has also been noted that some will penetrate at the same time, usually by one of the more aggressive species piggy backing on another."

info.brief_description: Five people are placed on an island that can change their weight.
info.description:
A Strange Man offers five people the chance to win a million dollars. He flys them to a distant island known as Isla de Obeso, where things can magically cause weight gain in people. They must try their best to avoid getting fat, and whomever is the thinnest at the end (however large they might be) wins the money, and the losers keep their weight, and become permanent residents of the Island.

Go Crazy. Have Fun. GP for good additions!
